value:
$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|$w0|The Tempest, you say?$k$p$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Yes. A vortex of the realms. To
perform the rite is to pierce the
worlds. $k$pInside the Tempest is a region of pure
chaos. It should not exist, and
yet...it does.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|$w0|I see. That sounds very different than
the gateways.$k$p$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Yes. The Tempest tears the worlds.
There's no way to control which
worlds join together, once torn...$k$pOr what happens afterward.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|$w0|$EFace_Smile|I'm interested.$k$p$EFace|May I ask just one question?$k$p$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Of course.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Who are you?$k$p$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|$w0|...$k$p$Sbv0,6000|$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|$w0|You've been posing as my brother
since this morning. Why? $k$pI know you're a fake. My brother
isn't here. He's...searching for
something. $k$pTell me, and I may even spare your
life. Well, for a minute or two, at least.$k$p$Sbs150|$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|$w0|...$k$p$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_04,0|$EFace_Smile|What a surprise! $k$p$SspSE_EFFECT_MIL|$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|$Fi500|$w0|$EFace_Smile|Few can see through my illusions so
quickly. $k$p$SspSE_EFFECT_MIL|$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|$Fi500|$w0|$EFace_Smile|Leave it to the princess of Embla to
find me out. How adorable.$k$pSo now that you know...$k$p$SspSE_EFFECT_MIL|$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|$Fi500|$w0|$EFace_Smile|Wouldn't you say that this is a good
look for me? I think I'll stick with it for
now.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|$w0|What's your name? $k$p$WmMPID_ロキアンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Loki, dear. It's Loki. And if you want to
see what I really look like...well...
you're going to have to wait.$k$pNow, Veronica...about that rite...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|$w0|I'll do it. $k$pI've read that the Heroes called by
the Tempest are strong, so... Of
course I'll do it.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキアンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Hah! You knew about the Tempest
this whole time. How delightfully
cunning you are. $k$pI like it. In fact, I find I'm quite taken
with you, Princess Veronica. $k$pWe're well on the way to becoming
fast friends, aren't we? $k$p

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|"Forces led by Princess Veronica
of Embla streamed in from the north
and besieged the Tower of Heaven..."$k$pThe report goes on to say that the
enemy has captured the tower. I'm
sure we'll find her here.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|The Tower of Heaven is a holy site.
Whatever Princess Veronica has in
mind, well... It can't be good for us.$k$pWe don't have time to wait for our
forces to catch up. We have to stop
her. Now.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_01,0|$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|Princess Veronica!$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Well look who showed up to my party.
You're late, though. There's nothing
you can do to stop the Tempest now.$k$pSoon, I'll have more Heroes on
my side... So many that you won't
even be able to count them all...$k$pI'll make them ALL mine! And then I'll
finally crush your pathetic little
kingdom.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|Stop!$k$pIt's no good. We can't let her escape.
We have to stop her now!$k$pInto the storm, everyone—into the
Tempest!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|$w0|...$k$pThis world is shrouded in despair...$k$pI must hurry. The future depends on
it.$k$p$Sbs150|
